name: SHTACKITT
description:
Enter the exciting world of precision cargo container packing. Each round you are tasked with filling and shipping a full container with cargo. It is possible to fully fill every container with the cargo provided. Click and drag the cargo into the container. You may rotate the camera, but not the pieces. The bigger the piece the higher the value. 

RULES:

  • Ship containers to increase your score
  • You must fill each container to at least 50%
  • Fill to 75% for a 2x multiplier
  • Fill to 100% for a 10x multiplier
  • The bigger the cargo, the higher the value.
  • Cargo that sticks out of the container does not count
  • You have 5 minutes

CONTROLS:

  • CLICK & DRAG to move cargo
  • Q & E to rotate the camera
  • SPACE to SHIP the container
  • R to RESET with new cargo
  • ESCAPE to quit
